overview: The Attendance Management System allows teachers and administrators to track, manage, and analyze student attendance across multiple classes. The system provides comprehensive attendance tracking with multiple view modes, real-time marking capabilities, and detailed reporting features.

requirements.name: Attendance Screen - Main Dashboard
requirements.description: Central hub for attendance management with multiple view modes
features: Display class selector with all assigned classes
Show attendance summary statistics (present, absent, late, attendance rate)
Support multiple view modes: Overview, Calendar, Analytics, Monthly, List, Table
Allow switching between view modes seamlessly
Display current date and allow date selection

requirements.name: Class Selection
requirements.description: Allow users to select from their assigned classes
features: Display all classes as clickable cards/buttons
Highlight the currently selected class
Show basic class information (name, student count)
Load class-specific attendance data on selection

requirements.name: Attendance Overview Tab
requirements.description: Display student cards with attendance status and marking capabilities
features: Show all students enrolled in the selected class
Display student information (name, roll number, avatar)
Show current attendance status for each student
Display check-in and check-out times
Provide Mark In and Mark Out buttons

requirements.name: Mark In/Out Time Functionality
requirements.description: Record student arrival and departure times
features: Mark student in-time with single click
Mark student out-time with single click
Automatically determine status based on time
Update UI immediately after successful marking

requirements.name: Monthly Attendance Matrix
requirements.description: Display comprehensive monthly attendance in a matrix/grid format
features: Show all students in rows
Show all days of the month in columns
Display attendance status with color coding
Show per-student summary statistics
Allow month navigation

requirements.name: Table View
features: Columns: Roll No, Student Name, Status, In Time, Out Time, Actions
Alternate row colors for readability
Show summary footer with total counts
Provide action buttons for each student

requirements.name: List View
features: Show student name, roll number, status
Show in-time and out-time
Provide action buttons for each student

requirements.name: Excel Export
requirements.description: Export attendance data to Excel format
features: Export button visible in monthly view
Generate summary and daily attendance sheets
Color-code cells based on status
Auto-download with meaningful filename

requirements.name: PDF Export
requirements.description: Export attendance data to PDF format
features: Export button visible in monthly view
Generate professional PDF report
Include daily attendance matrix
Include summary page with statistics

requirements.name: Teacher Portal Integration
requirements.description: Attendance management integrated into teacher portal
features: Access attendance from teacher portal navigation
Show only classes assigned to logged-in teacher
Support all view modes
Display attendance history
